xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This module provides functions that gets components of the dynamic context.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Federico Cavalieri

xqdoc:description.p: The returned id is opaque and should not be used for reasoning about time. The only guarantee is that the value returned by this function increases each time a snapshot finishes.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: dctx:snapshot-id
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function dctx:snapshot-id() as xs:unsignedLong external
